summary: AN ORDINANCE amending the 2008 Adopted Budget, including the 2008-2013 Capital Improvement Program (CIP); changing appropriations to various departments and budget control levels, and from various funds in the Budget; lifting provisos; making cash transfers between various City funds; creating positions; adding new projects, revising project descriptions and allocations in the 2008-2013 CIP for certain projects; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
